wave_0_per_frame2=t2 = spin;
wave_0_per_frame3=red = (-1 * cos(time))  + abs(-1 * cos(time)) + 0.2 * (cos(sin(time))+(abs(cos(sin(time)))+cos(sin(time))));
wave_0_per_frame4=green = abs(sin(time)) ;
wave_0_per_frame5=blue = cos(time)  + abs(cos(time));
wave_0_per_frame6=r = if(above(red,1),1,if(above(red,0), abs(red),0));
wave_0_per_frame7=g = if(above(green,1),1,if(above(green,0), abs(green),0));
wave_0_per_frame8=b = if(above(blue,1),1,if(above(blue,0), abs(blue),0));
wave_0_per_point1=rad = q4*sample*t3+t2;
wave_0_per_point2=x = .5 + cos(rad/64)*0.4 + sin(rad)*0.6;

shape_3_per_frame2=g = 1-abs(q2);
shape_3_per_frame3=b = 1-abs(q3);
shape_3_per_frame4=r2 = q6;
shape_3_per_frame5=g2 = q7;
shape_3_per_frame6=b2 = q8;
per_frame_init_1=q9 = .5;
per_frame_1=vol_now =  .4 * bass + 0.1 * (bass_att+treb+mid);
per_frame_2=vol_mean =  if(equal(frame%50,0),vol_mean-0.5*(vol_mean-vol_now),0.1*(vol_mean*9 + vol_now));
per_frame_3=q9 = .01*(abs(sin(vol_mean)));
per_frame_4=beat = if(above(vol_now,1.1*vol_mean),1,0);
per_frame_5=slowtime = slowtime+beat*time;
per_frame_6=q4 = sin(slowtime);
per_frame_7=climb = climb + q9 + abs(q4);
per_frame_8=q5 = climb;
per_frame_9=firstr = 0.57*( 0.60*sin(0.374*climb) + 0.40*sin(0.294*climb) );
per_frame_10=firstg = 0.57*( 0.60*sin(0.393*climb) + 0.40*sin(0.223*climb) );
per_frame_11=firsgb = 0.57*( 0.60*sin(0.412*climb) + 0.40*sin(0.364*climb) );
per_frame_12=q1 = firstr;
per_frame_13=q2 = firstg;
per_frame_14=q3 = firstb;
per_frame_15=myr = cos(slowtime);
per_frame_16=myg = cos(slowtime)*sign(cos(slowtime));
per_frame_17=myb = sin(time) ;
per_frame_18=redneg = if(below(myr,0),1,0);
per_frame_19=greenneg = if(below(myg,0),1,0);
per_frame_20=blueneg = if(below(myb,0),1,0);
per_frame_21=newred = if(redneg,if(bor(greenneg , blueneg),abs(myr),1+myr),myr);
per_frame_22=newgreen = if(greenneg,if(equal(greenneg + blueneg,2),abs(myg),1+myg),myg);
per_frame_23=newblue = if(blueneg,-1*myb,myb);
per_frame_24=finalred = if(above(finalred+finalgreen+finalblue,1),abs(finalred-.5),finalred);
per_frame_25=finalgreen = if(above(finalred+finalgreen+finalblue,1),abs(finalgreen-.5),finalgreen);
per_frame_26=finalblue = if(above(finalred+finalgreen+finalblue,1),abs(finalblue-.5),finalblue);
per_frame_27=q6 = finalred;
per_frame_28=q7 = finalgreen;
per_frame_29=q8 = finalbllue;
per_frame_30=monitor = q4;
per_pixel_1=zoom=zoom+atan(zoom)*.1;
per_pixel_2=rot=rot+sin(zoom*4+q4)*.1;
per_pixel_3=xy=x*y+q4;
per_pixel_4=dx=dx+sin(xy)*.01;
per_pixel_5=dy=dy+cos(xy)*.01;
